channel.title: CVE Feed for systemd -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for systemd -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-15688|2024-09-17T01:20:40.408Z -- systemd -- systemd
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in the dhcp6 client of systemd allows a malicious dhcp6 server to overwrite heap memory in systemd-networkd. Affected releases are systemd: versions up to and including 239.
